trans-unit.source: Only update advertising manifests.
trans-unit.target: 只更新廣告資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: Cannot use the {0} and {1} options together.
trans-unit.target: Cannot use the {0} and {1} options together.

trans-unit.source: Update all installed workloads.
trans-unit.target: 更新所有已安裝的工作負載。

trans-unit.source: Update workloads to a previous version specified by the argument. Use the 'dotnet workload history' to see available workload history records.
trans-unit.target: Update workloads to a previous version specified by the argument. Use the 'dotnet workload history' to see available workload history records.

trans-unit.source: Include workloads installed with earlier SDK versions in update.
trans-unit.target: 包含更新中與舊版本 SDK 一起安裝的工作負載。

trans-unit.source: Update workloads based on specified rollback definition file.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定的復原定義檔更新工作負載。

trans-unit.source: Update to the workload versions specified in the history without changing which workloads are installed. Currently installed workloads will be updated to match the specified history version.
trans-unit.target: Update to the workload versions specified in the history without changing which workloads are installed. Currently installed workloads will be updated to match the specified history version.

trans-unit.source: Workload history records are created when when running an operation that modifies workloads like update or install. Cannot update from history until workload history records exist.
trans-unit.target: Workload history records are created when when running an operation that modifies workloads like update or install. Cannot update from history until workload history records exist.

trans-unit.source: No workload update found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到任何工作負載更新。

trans-unit.source: No workloads installed for this feature band. To update workloads installed with earlier SDK versions, include the --from-previous-sdk option.
trans-unit.target: 此功能帶未安裝任何工作負載。若要更新與舊版本 SDK 一起安裝的工作負載，請包含 --from-previous-sdk 選項。

trans-unit.source: Installation rollback failed: {0}
trans-unit.target: 安裝復原失敗: {0}

trans-unit.source: Workload installation failed. Rolling back installed packs...
trans-unit.target: 工作負載安裝失敗。正在復原已安裝的套件...

trans-unit.source: Workload '{0}' failed to update due to the following:
trans-unit.target: 因為下列原因，所以無法更新工作負載 '{0}':

trans-unit.source: Updating to a rollback file is not compatible with workload sets. Install and Update will now use loose manifests. To update to a specific workload version, use --version.
trans-unit.target: 更新至復原檔案與工作負載集不相容。安裝和更新現在將使用鬆散的資訊清單。若要更新至特定工作負載版本，請使用 --version。

trans-unit.source: Successfully updated workload(s): {0}.
trans-unit.target: 已成功更新工作負載: {0}。

trans-unit.source: Failed to download workload update packages to cache: {0}
trans-unit.target: 無法將工作負載更新套件下載到快取: {0}

trans-unit.source: The ID of a workload history record should be between 1 and the number of workload history records, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: The ID of a workload history record should be between 1 and the number of workload history records, inclusive.

trans-unit.source: Invalid argument "{0}" to the --mode argument for dotnet workload update. Only supported modes are "workloadset", "loosemanifest", and "auto".
trans-unit.target: Invalid argument "{0}" to the --mode argument for dotnet workload update. Only supported modes are "workloadset", "loosemanifest", and "auto".

trans-unit.source: Successfully updated advertising manifests.
trans-unit.target: 已成功更新廣告資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: Workload update failed: {0}
trans-unit.target: 工作負載更新失敗: {0}

trans-unit.source: Workload version {0} not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到工作負載版本 {0}。
